Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Enacts the "End Hedge Fund Control of New York Homes Act"
Summary: Imposes an excise tax on the failure of certain hedge funds owning excess single-family residences to dispose of such residences; establishes the housing down payment trust fund to provide funds to state housing finance agencies to establish new or supplement existing programs that provide down payment assistance to families purchasing homes within the state.
LawCode: Add Art 20-E §§500 - 500-g, Tax L; add §80-b, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to impose an excise tax on the failure of certain hedge funds owning excess single-family residences to dispose of such residences; and to amend the state finance law, in relation to establishing the housing down payment trust fund and directing the commissioner of the state division of housing and community renewal to establish a grant program
